fields.name: input_energy_vector
fields.description: It describes any type of energy or energy carrier (e.g. electricity, heat, solar radiation, natural gas, ...) that enters a technology.

fields.name: output_energy_vector
fields.description: It describes any type of energy or energy carrier (e.g. electricity, heat, hydrogen, LNG, CO2, ...) that exits a technology.

fields.name: parameter_name
fields.description: It describes a considered property of an element in the energy system.

fields.name: technology
fields.description: It describes an element of the modelled energy system that processes an energy vector.

fields.name: technology_type
fields.description: The specification can be technological, or freely user-defined, based on the requirements of the model.

_comment.dates: Dates and time must follow the ISO8601 including time zone (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh)
_comment.units: Use a space between numbers and units (100 m)
_comment.languages: Languages must follow the IETF (BCP47) format (en-GB, en-US, de-DE)
_comment.licenses: License name must follow the SPDX License List (https://spdx.org/licenses/)
